reviews.text: I've been to this hotel in 2008 and came back again in July 2013. We rented one of the apartments in the upper part of the hotel and had a nice view pool. Rooms are big and very clean. When I stayed there in 2008 the hotel had just been refurbished and five years later everything was in the same condition (rooms and bathrooms). The food is mainly Greek cuisine but it's varied and tasty and the restaurant staff is always friendly and polite.
